name: Mojito
description: The Mojito is traditionally served over ice in a highball glass and often associated with summer.
ingredients: 12 mint sprigs, or spearmint, 8 roughly broken apart
directions: Place ice in beverage shaker then add in the rum, 8 broken up mint sprigs, lime juice, and sugar.
Shake well and serve over ice in a high ball glass. Top off each glass with a splash of club soda.
Garnish each with a slice of lime and a sprig of mint.
